name: Warriors Of Ragnarök
description: Warriors Of Ragarök is a single player top down real time strategy tower defense game. You have to attack and defend towers to survive. Set in the viking age, hordes are fighting for the realms will you be the dominant realm?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i3-3220 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 780 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
